title: kOlam kaNDu
sahitya:
kOlam kaNDu kali tIrndEn kanNA kOTi janamap-payan aDaindEn tiruk-


anupallavi

  shIla mAmunivar sheidiDum pUjaiyil cittam magizhndu nittam uDuppi urai unran


caraNam    pAl abhiSEkam tanil paramA en nenjam paravashamAgi nirmalamAnadE
 tEn abhiSEkam tanil dEvA teviTTAda nAmam nAvil shuvai kUTTudE
 paramanun padam vaitta pazham kaNDEn manam pazham pazham poruL nI enru teLivuTradE
 karpUra oLi tirumEni shuDaril onra arputamAi ennuL oLi kUDiTrE
			madhyamakAlam
onbaduDan onrum avatAram koNDa unnai onbadu vAshal vazhi kaNDu karam kuvittu
 onbadu bhakti tanil onru kaikkoNDu urugi urugi unaip-pADi Adit-tiruk-
